channel.title: Coordinates of objects via client, what's the method?
channel.description: I need the method that contains the x and y coordinates of the objects because I'm trying to make it so when you right click on an object, it shows you the object id and the coordinates of that object. I currently have the object id, but I can't seem to find what it is that stores the coordinates. I'm not talking about a makeGlobalObject thing. I mean objects in the servers set by default via the client. Like the statue of saradomin in the middle of falador center. I know that's spawned through the client, but where can I find the coords?
